import type { InstructorResponse } from "services/courses"; import { useLogoutMutation} from 'services/auth'; import cookie from 'react-cookies'; import { useHistory } from 'react-rout' type DropdownProps = { profile: InstructorResponse } export const UserDropdown: React.FC = ({ profile }) => { const [ logout ] = useLogoutMutation() if (!profile) { return null; } return (
  • {profile.avatar ? ( ) : (
    {profile.first_name && profile.first_name.substr(0, 2) || profile.email && profile.email.substr(0, 2) || profile.user && profile.user.email && profile.email.substr(0, 2)}
    )} {profile.first_name ? `${profile.first_name} ${profile.last_name}` : profile.email ? profile.email : profile.user.email} {profile.email ? profile.email : profile.user ? profile.user.email : ''}
  • My notifications
  • Public profile
  • Payout settings
  • { event.preventDefault() const obj = { csrfmiddlewaretoken: cookie.load('csrftoken') } logout(obj) }} rel=" noopener noreferrer" target="_self" role="menuitem" > Log out
); };
